alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 04 at 7:37PM MST until March 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning will expire at 8 PM MST this evening for Fire Weather Zones 226 through 237, which includes all of the southeast plains... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 10 AM to 5 PM Saturday for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 230, 233, and 237, which includes Las Animas and Baca Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 230...233 AND 237... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 230...233 AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 230...233 and 237. * Winds...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Timing...Gusty west winds will continue across the southern tier of Colorado through the early evening, with winds diminishing through late evening. Gusty west winds are expected to pick up again Saturday morning and continue through the afternoon. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
